document.full_text: the yankees got a hit from every member of the starting lineup and eight solid innings from c. c. sabathia to win the finale of a three-game series in seattle.
document.title: yankees 7, mariners 1: bullpen rests as sabathia helps yankees avoid a sweep
lines_and_colors: the yankees got a hit from every member of the starting lineup and eight solid innings from c. c. sabathia to win the finale of a three-game series in seattle.
